name: California Cobb Salad
description: This classic chicken salad gets a West coast twist with salmon and goat cheese.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 pint cherry tomatoes, cut in half

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a grill pan over medium high heat. Brush salmon with olive oil and season both sides with salt and pepper. Grill salmon until just cooked through, about 4 minutes per side depending on thickness. Set aside.
Place lettuce, eggs, bacon, avocados, cherry tomatoes, and goat cheese in a large bowl. Toss to combine.
In a medium bowl, whisk together all ingredients for dressing. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Pour dressing over lettuce mixture and toss to combine.
Cut salmon into 4 pieces. Divide salad between 4 bowls, topping each bowl with a piece of salmon.
